protein.specific_function: Converts phosphatidylinositol 3,4,5-trisphosphate (PtdIns 3,4,5-P3) to PtdIns-P2. Specific for lipid substrates, inactive towards water soluble inositol phosphates.

go_class.description: hydrolase activity, acting on ester bonds
positive regulation of neuron projection development

reference.reference_text: Kisseleva MV, Wilson MP, Majerus PW: The isolation and characterization of a cDNA encoding phospholipid-specific inositol polyphosphate 5-phosphatase. J Biol Chem. 2000 Jun 30;275(26):20110-6.
